item.title: Using AWS Batch Console Support for Step Functions Workflows
item.description: Last year, we published the Genomics Secondary Analysis Using AWS Step Functions and AWS Batch solution as a companion solution to the Genomics Data Transfer, Analytics, and Machine Learning Using AWS Services whitepaper. Since then, many customers have used the secondary analysis solution to automate their bioinformatics pipelines in AWS. A common pain point expressed [â€¦] Read the full post at the AWS HPC Blog.
